Key Match Events: New Orleans (2-2) dropped to .500 on Tuesday by virtue of a 124-106 loss at Golden State (3-1).
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans play Golden State again Wednesday at 9 p.m. TV coverage on GCSEN begins at 8:30, as is the case for pregame on the Pelicans radio network.
On Western Conference Wednesday, New Orleans is one of six West teams sporting a 2-2 record, essentially filling spots No. 7 through 12 in the standings.
Post-Match Reflections: Watch Ingram’s postgame interview from the locker room, as well as that of Willie Green.
